title: Derrick White breaks out of shooting slump and other takeaways from Celtics win over Pistons
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Boston Celtics "I told somebody one game that I might not make anything else, but I'll make a big one," White said.
Matthew J.
Lee/Globe Staff Derrick White scratched his head and smiled as he was asked about his slump-busting 27-point performance against Detroit on Wednesday night.

title: Karen Read’s lawsuit against investigators, witnesses alleging cover-up moves to federal court
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Crime The lawsuit, filed by Read against investigators, the McCabes, the Alberts, and Brian Higgins, was filed in federal court Tuesday.
Karen Read listens to the cross examination by Robert Alessi of expert accident witness Dr.

title: John Kerry knighted in England by King Charles for climate change efforts
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Politics The diplomat, who served as Biden’s climate envoy, was bestowed the award for “services to tackling climate change.
” Kerry was bestowed the award for his contributions to tackling climate change.

David Hansen/Salve Regina University Former US Secretary of State John Kerry was knighted Wednesday by King Charles III, receiving England’s highest honor in a closed-door reception at Buckingham Palace.

title: Several suspects facing charges after police recover meth, cocaine in Roslindale drug bust
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The suspects were arrested after police searched a Roslindale apartment and found a kilogram each of meth and cocaine.
Police recovered over 1,000 grams each of methamphetamine and pink cocaine in the drug bust Monday.
Boston Police Department Boston police arrested four suspects Monday and recovered two kilograms of methamphetamine and cocaine in connection with a drug investigation in Roslindale.

title: DA: Suspect identified in homicide of Fall River man outside liquor store
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The suspect was arrested in Florida and is being held there until he can be brought back to Massachusetts.
Fall River police have identified an alleged suspect in a homicide that happened Saturday outside a liquor store, according to prosecutors.
Kendrick Williams, 32, of Fall River, was arrested Wednesday in Jacksonville, Fla.

title: Pedestrian, 68, struck and killed by SUV in Haverhill
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The Volvo, carrying an infant, was first hit by a pick-up truck before hitting a third vehicle, the DA said.
A 68-year-old pedestrian died after being struck by a car carrying an infant in Haverhill Tuesday night, officials said.
The man was hit by a 2008 Volvo XC90 on River Street near Hunter Avenue just before 8 p.

title: Denial of service to Black journalist was a case of ‘mistaken identity,’ says Caffè Nero
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News “The reason this is an issue for me is because I don't want it to happen to anyone else,” said Phillip Martin, a retired investigative reporter.
Phillip Martin, a retired investigative reporter for GBH, says he was refused service at a Cambridge coffee shop after employees mistook him for someone else.
